content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans:wght@100;300;400;500;700&subset=cyrillic,cyrillic-ext,greek,greek-ext,latin-ext');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+SC:wght@100;300;400;500;700');
@import url('https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css');

div#page-content {
    font-family: "Noto Sans SC", "Noto Sans";
    color: #000;
}

/* コンテスト終了時に開ける */
div#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points {
    font-size: 0 !important;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 100%;
}

div#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box {
    background-color: #633;
}

div#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points span {
    font-size: 12px !important;
}

div#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points::before {
    content: "↑/↓：";
    font-size: 12px !important;
}

div#page-content div.blockquote.infohead,
div#page-content div.blockquote.info {
    border: solid 3px #000;
    border-radius: 12px;
    position: relative;
}

div#page-content div.blockquote.infohead {
    margin-top: 50px;
}

div#page-content div.blockquote.infohead::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    left: calc(50% - 20px);
    top: -21.5px;
    background-image: url("https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A6943710-11-08x3/info.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: 40px 40px;
}

div#page-content div.blockquote.infohead.warning::before {
    background-image: url("https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A6943710-64-1jqc/warning.svg");
}

div#page-content div.blockquote.info.msg {
    margin: 0;
    width: 80%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    position: relative;
}

/* div#page-content div.blockquote.info.msg::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: -16px;
    top: 15px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 15px;
    height: 30px;
    border-top: solid 15px transparent;
    border-left: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 15px transparent;
    border-right: solid 15px #000;
} */

div#page-content div.blockquote.info.test {
    margin: 1%;
    padding: 0;
    width: 48%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    position: relative;
}

div#page-content div.blockquote.info.test img {
    border-radius: 10px;
}

div#page-content hr {
    height: 0;
    border: solid 1.5px #666;
    border-radius: 1.5px;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="border: solid 3px #000;"]]
